thread.title: All aboard the family-friendly Italian city break

title: All aboard the family-friendly Italian city break
text:
Tourists turn us into Lanzagrotty, warns president Last updated at 12:01AM, July 15 2015 
Fernando Clavijo, new president of the Canary Islands, has warned that unless the archipelago moves away from mass tourism it could succumb to the ‘Magaluf effect’ A Good Walk: Barley and Pendle Hill Published at 12:01AM, July 11 2015 
The witch trials of 1612 still cast a long shadow across Pendle Hill, a looming presence over the village of Barley Published at 12:01AM, July 11 2015 
Celebrating a special occasion in Madeira; spending Christmas on slopes; a trip to Prague; enduring flight cancellations How to do New York in summer Published at 12:01AM, July 11 2015 
Don’t be put off by the heat — there are great deals, and there’s plenty to do outside, says Jane Knight Sponsored Editorial
